name: TerrainCheck
description:
Hello Internet,

First of all I would like to thank The Linux Gamer for such a great opportunity. This is my very first creation. I am new to Unity 3D & game development. I have made a Terrain in which player can explore.

This game was created in just a 2 days starting from scratch. I am a college student who is perusing mechanical engineering, so Unity 3D & game development is totally new topic for me. I am still in learning stage on my own with no formal training, so this is the best I can give.

Thank You
